casebody.data:
STETSER
v.
TAP PHARMACEUTICAL PROD. No. 142PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 3, 2005. Marvin K. Blount, Jr., Marvin K. Blount, III, Greenville, Donald E. Haviland, Jr., TerriAnne Benedetto, Kent Williams, Jonathan Shub, Philadelphia, PA., for Stetser et al. Matthew W. Sawchak, Raleigh, for Takeda Chemical Industries, Ltd.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th day of February 2005 by Defendant (Takeda Pharmaceutical Co.) to Seal Selected Portion of Defendant Appellee's Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of March 2005."
